CustomField.formula: CASE (TEXT(RF6_Financial_Penalty_Scheme__c), "Above 5% of Annual Revenue",IMAGE( '/resource/RedRiskImage', 'Red',20,40), "None",IMAGE( '/resource/GreenGoImage', 'Green',20,40), "Max 5% of Annual Revenue",IMAGE( '/resource/GreenGoImage', 'Green',20,40), "")
CustomField.label: RAG
